name: Livecricketscore
tagline: Display Live cricket score and top cricket news, scores and news source from cricinfo.com
body:
**Display Live cricket score and top cricket news**

[livecricscorenewsv1.0](https://github.com/laxman954/livecricketscore/raw/master/cricscorenewsv1.0.jar) display live cricket score(updated every 5 mins), and top cricket news

[livecricscorenewsv1.1](https://github.com/laxman954/livecricketscore/raw/master/cricscorenewsv1.1.jar) made changes for cricinfo blocked system, now the system requesting for other server to get score and news feed. (sirpigal.org)

**Features**
* Your office or workstation blocked cricket sites, this app works for you
* Easy UI  & Fast score and news update

Review & Feedback  [https://goo.gl/5SSPMU](https://goo.gl/5SSPMU)

**Technologies Used**

* Java 7 
* Window Builder -Swing
* JAXB - Marshal & Unmarshall the feed from cricinfo
* Resource Bundle

If you face any issues check wiki - [https://github.com/laxman954/livecricketscore/wiki](https://github.com/laxman954/livecricketscore/wiki)

Score & news source by [cricinfo.com](cricinfo.com)

### Authors and Contributors

Lekshmana Perumal M @laxman954 , mlekshmanap@gmail.com , http://lekshmanan954.wordpress.com
